Improving Power Efficiency of Web

With the ubiquity of internet-enabled mobile devices, the nature of software running in mobile devices is changing dramatically. We are exploring several alternatives to improve power efficiency: hardware/software co-design for common and costly operations; and exploring parallelism in common applications.

Current contacts: Owen Anderson, Emily Fortuna, Luis Ceze, and Susan Eggers.

College of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Massachusetts Amherst
